title: BRIEF-Sprint Announces Private Placement Offering Of Wireless Spectrum-Backed Notes
text: March 12, 2018 / 10:45 AM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-Sprint Announces Private Placement Offering Of Wireless Spectrum-Backed Notes Reuters Staff March 12 (Reuters) - Sprint Corp: * SPRINT CORPORATION ANNOUNCES PRIVATE PLACEMENT OFFERING OF WIRELESS SPECTRUM-BACKED NOTES * SPRINT - UNITS COMMENCED OFFER OF UP TO $3.94 BILLION OF WIRELESS SPECTRUM-BACKED NOTES IN TWO TRANCHES * SPRINT - ‍ISSUANCE PART OF $7 BILLION NOTES PROGRAM ESTABLISHED IN OCT 2016​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
